name: straw production, stand-alone production | straw, stand-alone production | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3948/documentation

Refers to 1 kg dry matter of fresh straw from straw areas with 1.66 kg CO2  and 17.6 MJ per kg dry matter. The dry matter content of fresh straw is about 15%  the density about 120 kg/m3;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



The inventories include the cultivation of straw on a straw area. Included steps are harvest and  loading for transport.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0111:Growing of cereals (except rice), leguminous crops and oil seeds

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Refers to straw areas in the Swiss plateau (lowlands <700m).
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography CH. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data were compiled from statistics, fertilising recommendations, documents from extension services and expert knowledge.

exchanges.description: EcoSpold01Location=CH
